chain_mail.name: Chain Mail
chain_mail.description: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows.

longsword.name: Longsword
longsword.description: A versatile weapon that can be used with one or two hands.

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand.
